description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

Greetings, 
We blocked the page. Have you received any reports of phishing attempts since your last email?
Regards, 
CSIRT-U

Greetings,

there are no more reports. Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Hello, 

Was my message useful? Should I do it regularly? 

Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

Hi, 
thanks, everyone should report phishing if they notice it.  It was useful. 

Regards, 
CSIRT-U

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings, 

Can you please explain to me why our website is not available? 

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings, 
We needed to block your project homepage, because we got reports of phishing attempts from it. We are communicating with the administrator of the page to find the problem out and then we will try to turn it back on. 
Regard, 
CSIRT-U

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

We are sorry, but due to security reasons we can not turn it back on till we solve it with the asministrator. 
Best wishes, 
CSIRT-U

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hello, We received a report of suspicious content on your page ( https://nice-project.uni.ex/ ). Can you please check it out? 
CSIRT-U

Can you please specify what actions should be performed and what do you expect from us ? 

Best,
Cloud provider

We just power off a virtual machine hosting this website. Is it ok ? 

Best,
Cloud provider

No, can you please turn it back on. And if possible, can you check if the website content on HTTPS (443) protocol is as expected? We have recieved report with screenshot of the website.

Regards,
CSIRT UNI

This is the in-house provider of cloud services for the university.

Best, Cloud provider

It will take some time to turn it on. We will inform you. 

Best,
Cloud provider

Sorry, It was our fault. You need to turn it off again. Can you give us contact information of the administrator of the page. 
CSIRT-U

The VM is still turned off. The admin of the VM is harris@mail.uni.ex

Best,
Cloud provider

Do you have any backups of the VM? 

CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Lisa Grant, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hello, 
We received reports of possible phishing attempts on your accounts. We recommend you to change your password. 
Regards, 
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Lisa Grant

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hello, 
We received reports of possible phishing attempts on your accounts. We recommend you to change your password. 
Regards, 
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.
Should I reinstall my computer???

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

No, you should change your password. And you can run antivirus scan on your computer. 
Best regards, 
CSIRT-U

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

description: Email address of Peter Quinn, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Hello, 
We received reports of possible phishing attempts on your accounts. We recommend you to change your password. 
Regards, 
CSIRT-U

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Dear Harris,

We have recieved numerous amout of phising reports redirecting users to your website. We were forced to shutdown your VM 198.51.100.40 and block the dns record. We want to know what was the original purpose and what were the changes made to the vm in the last week or two. If possible, do you have any logs?

Regards,
CSIRT-UNI

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine. I don't know about changes. 

Regards,
Harris

Hi, 
Do you have any backups? 

Regards, 
CSIRT-U

No. 

Harris

You need to restore the VM to state in which it was not infected and then we can unblock the VM. 

CSIRT-U
